author: The Editors
title: 1,423 New York Readers on the Coronavirus, Class, and Money
description: “Why is my life and my family’s life less important than theirs because of my income?”
content: Worldwide, deaths from the coronavirus have passed 100,000. In New York, over 170,000 confirmed cases have resulted in nearly 8,000 deaths and 19,000 hospitalizations - -though, so far, fears of hospital bed shortages have not been realized. With more than 16… [+22396 chars]
